Text: Great! Thanks a lot, downloading at 200kb/s and seeding.
Legit, working iso. L'll seed for 1 week.

@kinduff: Dude help me!! Installed ubuntu from XP as "Install inside windows" on my PC. Asked me to restart I did. Saw the ubuntu screen loading in dots then Black screen with texts then nothing happens help!!
@amjath: Sup, well you'll need to burn the cd image and restore the grub (search in google). Also, I don't recomend to install Ubuntu inside Windows, make a fresh install.
